entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android x64: runtime tests failing - `The following constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: _Global globalVar` #59679
  • System.Text.Json failing some large file tests #59678
  • The 'new' modifier doesn't always work with [JsonIgnore] #59675
  • `AssemblyName.CodeBase` stripped from `AssemblyName` before going to Resolving event handler #59669
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO runtime assert #59668
  • JIT: libraries PGO tests time out #59667
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Libraries PGO assert during find loops #59666
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Libraries Regex PGO tests failing with assert #59665
    7.0.0
  • ComWrappers: are there any (Roslyn) Source Generators planned? #59651
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: An API to optimally encapsulate several searching algorithms and techniques, using one simple class #59649
  • IHost.RunAsync() never completes via pm2 start and stop. #59644
  • [Performance Proposal] Use SIMDJson in Corehost #59642
  • Redundant info is shown in dotnet –info if install .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21473.26 SDK on Windows #59659
  • .NET 5.0.5 SortedSet(IComparer).GetViewBetween(X,Y).Max returns invalid value #59640
  • SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync(CancellationToken) is not cancelled when SemaphoreSlim.Dispose invoked immediately after CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #59639
  • X509Store.Add pops up a dialog, fails on OneCore system #59638
    Future
  • Embedded markdown readme for NuGet packages #59630
  • Augment Regex extensibility point for better perf and span-based matching #59629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeIntermediateWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: AllRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #59627

Closed

  • hacked by john in my iphone #59677
  • Many installer tests are failing because of Directory.Build.props file is missing #38530
    7.0.0
  • System.Speech.Tests fail GrammarBuilder test on non-English OS #59400
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: make not-generic JsonConverter constructor public #59493
  • NLS vs ICU difference in invariant case changing of title case characters. #59661
  • `System.Version` can't be Json-deserialized #59632
  • dotnet/runtime and dotnet/emsdk fail to build stable for .NET 6 #57982
    6.0.0
  • System.Collections - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58661
    Future
  • Alpine docker image does not obey local timezone anymore #59636
  • emsdk failure: emcmake not found #59556
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Dependency Injection SAVE_ASSEMBLIES code clean up #59684
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Enable running analyzers on DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59683
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • fix few more QUIC tests that can hang #59682
    area-System.Net
  • Using optimized ILGenerator.Emit function in Dependency Injection #59680
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition in ServiceProcess tests #59676
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add PEM exports to certificates #59674
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Prefer readonlyspan properties over readonly array fields #59670
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't print error message when Browser is closed while debugging #59664
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix for GitHub issue #59432 and the corresponding regression test #59663
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Several improvements to regex source generator #59660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Antigen: Change Antigen's helixqueue to public #59657
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • delay locking in `ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable` until necessary #59656
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1387932 #59652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Turn on XHarness telemetry for mono runtime tests #59646
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clean up fix for single-reg returned normalize-on-load vars #59645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Test the newest Arcade #59643
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Skip ExportPkcs7_Empty test on mobile platforms #59626
    area-System.Security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1388320 #59662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add InstallLocation component to host #59654
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add checking SpeechRecognitionEngine Culture to GrammarBuilder test #59516
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • forward-port from `release/6.0-rc2`: MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, a… #59597
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Change loop cloning condition blocks flow graph #59233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update area-owners.md to account for pod change #59635
    area-Meta
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Write SPMI download progress in MB #59647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the argument checks to Unix-part of Mutex.OpenExistingWorker #59634
    area-System.Runtime
  • [mono] Improve Makefile's dotnet.js dependencies #59603
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] windows: Fail the build if provisioning fails #59560
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove invalid test exclusions. #59608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Dependency Injection support for ValueTypes as Services #59625
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Additional trimming for EventSource.IsSupported feature switch #56564
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Conditionally build tests, using the conds on which we submit tests to Helix #58511
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget(): write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57860
    area-DependencyModel, needs author feedback, 7.0.0
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs author feedback, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • WIP: Initial implementation of JIT assembly name helpers #48578
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Include BBJ_ALWAYS blocks in dominance calculation #59376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59510
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish --self-contained false --no-build` creates runtimeconfig with includedframework #21459
  • Update man page for .NET 6.0 #21449
  • Publish Debian packages for arm32 and arm64 to packages.microsoft.com #21447
  • Publish profile (.pubxml file) UX and ownership are confusing #21427
  • WorkloadManifest.json files in the SDK incorrectly have execute permissions #21426

Closed

  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails #21395
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet run -a` doesn't work well from x64 #21393
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet workload install macos` installs the world #21251
    6.0.2xx
  • CS4014 warning reported even though async call is waited. #21430
  • [6.0.100-rc.2.21472.34] nuke global tool app fails to restore #21362

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent GlobalUsings file from being cleaned. #21460
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1389013 #21455
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Backport][Blazor] from main: BlazorWasm: Fix including the target assembly #21453
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1388860 #21450
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1388516 #21444
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1388370 #21440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1388225 #21438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make aspnet-browser-refresh.js tolerate duplication insertions #21429
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • Fix RID resolution on x64 emulated installations #21435
    Area-CLI
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1389242 #21462
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure when manifest that is expected to exist isn't found #21358
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix Bash shebang for scripts to run under FreeBSD #21361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up client/server shutdown #21390
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fixing namespace should not move to top of the file. #56773
  • Semantic classification is currently unavailable #56766
  • [LSP] Goto/Peek definition on string literal does not go to definition #56765
    17.1
  • List of Workspace/OOP/infrastructure simplifications we may be able to make within the Workspace #56763
  • Static Abstract Interface Member issue related to Inheritance and Generic Constraints #56753

Closed

  • No language service features in LiveShare for 16.10 Preview 3 #53370
    17.0
  • Adding curly braces using Smart Break Line does not work for switch,case command. #54387
    17.0
  • RC1 regression: dependencies no longer work correctly in source generators across <ProjectReference> #56442
    17.0
  • Delegate parameter nullability attributes not respected in lambda analysis #45571
    Compiler.Next
  • Build failed due to NU3037 (The repository primary signature validity period has expired.) #52823
    17.0
  • Add miscellaneous files and metadata as source workspaces into LSP #53852
    17.0
  • Remove VSWin dependencies from RazorInProcLanguageClient #55060
    17.0
  • No error reported on consumption of conversion operator marked with [System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedCallersOnly] #54113
    17.0
  • Pull member up takes #region but not #endregion #51531
    17.0
  • Correct resolving of delegates and values parameters #56697

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 17.1-vs-deps back to main-vs-deps #56778
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge 17.1 back to main #56777
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Don't compute edits on zero-length semantic token sets #56774
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Add test verifying VB error ranges #56772
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56771
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56768
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add EditorBrowsable(Never) for obsolete method #56767
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure ReferenceCountedDisposable<T>.WeakReference is pointer-sized #56764
    Area-IDE
  • Move merge-conflict-fixes into the high-priority fix bucket. #56761
    Area-IDE
  • Emit compiler version to Windows PDB #56759
    Area-Compilers
  • Add documentation and unit test #56751
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix automation names for items in the Value Tracking tree #56717
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to 17.0-vs-deps #56776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid emitting compilation options and references to EnC deltas #56713
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.0 #56775
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56782
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56781
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56779
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Only force compute document diagnostics for the requ… #56696
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix unused Update parameter #56741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • workspace.TryApplyChanges should respect changes to DefaultNamespace, and other project information #46021
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56476
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ReadyToRun Compilation with runtime win-x64 gives error - NETSDK1095: Optimizing assemblies for performance is not supported for the selected target platform or architecture. #37034
  • Examine password hashing best practices and update as needed #37032
    7.0-preview1
  • Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4.1 -- Blazor Code Snippets inside Razor file not working #37031
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef, mapaction #37027
  • Startup regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #37026
  • Perf regression: plaintext #37025
  • HttpResponse.OnCompleted does not fire always fire for HTTP/1.1 #37024
  • aspnetcore-tooling-ci builds often fail due to transient versioning issues. #37021
    17.0-Preview5
  • ImageDisplay component sample #37016
    6.0.0
  • Huge Optimization Idea For Blazor Wasm #37015
  • Add Docs For Blazor Server SignalR Usage #37014
    6.0.0
  • Register custom event handlers in DOM and handle those in .NET is not working in .NET 6.0 #37012
  • How to get Physical Path for virtual path in .NET 6 RC1? #37008
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #37001
  • WebApplicationBuilder.WebHost.UseWebRoot(string) does not work witih UseStaticFiles(); #36999
    6.0.0
  • Automate localization for resources in templates using Arcade infrastructure #36998
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.1.21408.1] partial view can't be load when Compiled in Runtime with mixcore app. #35267
    6.0.0
  • How to obtain external login claims in Controller ? #37018
    Discussions
  • HTTP/3: Improve the preview features warning message. #36450
    6.0-rc2
  • Overwriting RenderTreeFrame within RenderTreeBuilder for a Markdown blazor component #36976
  • Blazor - support height of container in Virtualize component not fixed and infinite scroll like Twitter with browser scroll bar #36969
  • Startup regression: endpoint #37000
  • Blazor Server and Css Isolation using .Net 6 + VS Community 2022 #36996
  • Asp.Net Core Identity - request canceled when getting back to `signin-google` ... Only sometimes #36806
    Discussions
  • How to reference ProblemDetails in Blazor "shared" project? #36970
  • Blazor <PageTitle> component conflicts with svg <title> #36380
    6.0.0
  • Unknown error occurred while trying to verify Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource wth computed SHA-256 integrity #36993
  • Razor page call "component.razor" causes a problem in VS2022 #36995
  • Reminder for #33785 #37003
  • Default editor colors let TextMate shine through #36614
    17.0-Preview5
  • Blazor appsettings.Development.json is wrong #36457
    6.0.0
  • ASP.NET Core 6 Docs #33591
    6.0.0
  • .NET6 rc - MSB3030: Azure Pipeline Publish fails for Blazor Server Project that references nested razor component libraries #36639
  • Support finding & calling static TryParse/BindAsync methods for parameter binding of RequestDelegateFactory parameters from interfaces implemented by the target parameter type #36935
    6.0-rc2
  • Add MapPatch overloads to routing #36198
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/6.0] Fix uncompressed scenarios with DisableBuffering #37042
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37040
    area-runtime
  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37039
    area-runtime
  • Revert consolidating DefaultViewCompilerProvider + DefaultViewCompiler #37037
    area-mvc
  • ⬆️ SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21474.3 #37036
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix setting of WebRootPath in WebApplication #37033
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add source-index build job to pipeline #37028
    area-infrastructure
  • Add doc for updating Major Version & TFM #37020
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 37009: Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles #37019
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Try out BuildProjectReferences=false in Components #37017
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37013
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • fix template tests for SDK 5.0.401 #37011
    area-mvc
  • Release JS Blob after BrowserFileStream is disposed. Fixes #35540 #37004
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove extra aspnetcore-components-e2e build tasks #36997
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert consolidating DefaultViewCompilerProvider + DefaultViewCompiler #37035
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix uncompressed scenarios with DisableBuffering #37022
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Test in manual internal builds #36483
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Bump ansi-regex from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36863
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix http logging log typo #36950
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Update http3 RequiresPreviewFeatures attributes with message/URL #36491
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Normalize the content root and improve errors #36990
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, 6.0.0
  • Update sdk to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21470.6 #36781
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • sealed internal classes in default builder #36043
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • fix - Authority URL fix for blazor webassesmbly project #36460
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `40dfd4b` to `e4717df` #37005
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles. Fixes #36380. #37009
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport 36926 to rc2 #37010
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36955
    7.0-preview1
  • Add MapPatch API to endpointRouteBuilderExtensions #36818
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix event name of RequestLog #37044
    area-runtime
  • Fix event name of RequestLog #37043
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an AutoRetry flag for Sqlite commands #26187
  • OnModelCreating is called twice when adding a new migration #26186
  • Warning Entity 'Role' has a global query filter defined and is the required end of a relationship with the entity in a Many to Many relationships #26185
  • Scaffolding wants to use a different database provider to my project #26184
  • Update columns only for modified properties from disconnected entity. #26183

Closed

  • Query: SqlExpressionFactory doesn't apply type mapping to InExpression #26084
    6.0.0
  • Improve "Unable to determine the relationship" error when navigation is pointing to keyless entityType #18149
    6.0.0
  • IMethodCallTranslatorPlugin vs SqlNullabilityProcessor #26147
  • Support Collection types for Postgres Array operators #26180

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26191
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Add simple in-memory provider configure extension #26189
  • Add AutoRetry flag for commands #26188

Merged

  • [6.0] Fix to #26084 - Query: SqlExpressionFactory doesn't apply type mapping to InExpression #26153

Updated

  • More GroupBy tests #26105
